subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: I Want Revenge, the runaway winner of the Gotham Stakes last month, returns to the East Coast from California amid expectations of one more big race before the Kentucky Derby. I Want Revenge was made the 4-5 favorite for Saturday’s $750,000 Wood Memorial, a final prep at Aqueduct before the Derby on May 2.
